ygData.subject: Re: Marnek Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: If u guys want,anytime can give u guys the webspace+publicity but I cant do it..enough workload from the Everquest review already.Anyway I need any cool
ygData.messageBody:
If u guys want,anytime can give u guys the webspace+publicity but I cant do
it..enough workload from the Everquest review already.Anyway I need any cool
screenshots from EQ!!hehe..plz send to me if u have any!

Entreri

Email: drizzt@...
ICQ UIN: 2326860
Previewer, Singularity Gaming Network
http://www.sg-gaming.net
Your Single Source of Everything Gaming

.plan at
http://www.wplan.com/cgibin/directplan.cgi?name=Entreri&viewpass=

gonna
